item.description:
(facing Winthrop Park in the heart of Harvard Square, corner of JFK Street and Winthrop Street)

The Classic Dinner Dance:
Dance the Night Away to the Music of Bo and Bill Winker Orchestra


No cover to diners; $20 for non-diners
Dancing to begin around 9 pm

Here's what they're saying: "Probably our most popular event, we’ve again booked Bo and Bill for Thursday nights this winter and spring. We’ll clear away the tables in the Monday Club Bar, strike up the band, and dance until we drop. The old-fashioned glamour of a dinner dance with all your favorite tunes – from swing to the fox trot to Rock & Roll. Just come and dance in the spring with us at this most romantic of evenings."

Suggested donation of $2.00 to offset meetup costs/fee

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Upstairs with Bo
